mapper.select: SELECT ta.id AS activityId, ta.type As activityType, tg.id AS goodId, tg.sellerId AS sellerId, tg.name AS goodName, tg.goodNo, tg.price, tg.description, tg.promotion, tag.activityId, tag.goodId, ts.name AS sellerName FROM t_activity ta LEFT JOIN t_activity_good tag on ta.id = tag.activityId LEFT JOIN t_good tg ON tag.goodId=tg.id LEFT JOIN t_seller ts ON ts.id = tg.sellerId WHERE ta.type=#{type}
